name: Tic-Tac-Toe (miniprime1)
description:
#1. How to play

This Game is 2-Player Game (This game not support "Player vs CPU"). Player 1 is click 1 button and Player 2 is click 1 button except already clicked. And you keep doing this, you will get a winner

#2. How to Win / Lose / Tie

If Player 1 has three of his horses in a row (including diagonal lines) Player 1 wins!   And, If Player 2 has three of his horses in a row (including diagonal lines) Player 2 wins! Moreover, Anyone can't reach win, That becomes tie!

#3. Others

Other Info, Reference https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tic-tac-toe
